# About the xPack {{appName}}

{%- if customFields.isOrganizationWeb != "true" %}

## The project

The **xPack {{appName}}** project is part of the
[xPack Reproducible Build Framework](https://xpack.github.io)
and is hosted on GitHub as
[`xpack-dev-tools/{{gitHubProjectName}}`](https://github.com/xpack-dev-tools/{{gitHubProjectName}}/),
part of the [xPack Binary Development Tools](https://github.com/xpack-dev-tools/).

{%- endif %}

## The author

This project is currently maintained by **Liviu Ionescu**
([ilg-ul](https://github.com/ilg-ul)),
a senior computer engineer, with expertise in **C++/C embedded systems**,
**RTOSes**, **build tools**, operating systems, compilers
and Internet technologies.

He can be reached at [`<ilg@livius.net>`](mailto:ilg@livius.net).
Please note, this email address is provided as a courtesy.
For all correspondence related to {% if customFields.isOrganizationWeb == "true" %}the
**xPack {{appName}}** projects, kindly use the support pages of each individual project{% else%}the **xPack {{appName}}**
project, kindly use the project [support](/docs/support/) page{% endif %}).
